apps.name: Chromium v2
apps.subtitle: iOS 26 Compatible - Address Bar Crash Fixed
apps.versionDescription: Fixed address bar crashing issue and added iOS 26 compatibility. This version uses actual Chromium engine (not WebKit) with enhanced crash prevention and memory management.
apps.localizedDescription:
Native Chromium browser for iOS with crash-resistant address bar and iOS 26 compatibility. Features include:

• Fixed address bar crashes with comprehensive error handling
• True Chromium engine implementation (not WebKit-based)
• iOS 26 compatibility with enhanced UI support
• Advanced memory management and crash prevention
• Enhanced security with URL validation
• Improved accessibility features
• Optimized performance for modern iOS devices

news.title: Chromium iOS v2 - Address Bar Fix & iOS 26 Support!
news.caption: Fixed crashes and enhanced compatibility

news.title: Previous: Chromium for iOS now available through AltStore!
news.caption: Compiled by hand <3
